topic.title: FAQ - 常见问题解答
topic.body:
Note - Horizon won't work if the zeronet rev is lower than **3582**.

搜索太慢怎么办？

Why it's so slow to search?

因为Horizon的数据几百万行，而零网现在又不支持Full text search，要等到零网迁移到python3才能用。

Because Horizon has millions of data.And zeronet doesn't support Full text search.So it will be slow,but if zeronet uses python3 to support FTS(this is planed),it will be quicker.

进度条不动20多分钟了，咋回事

I'm waiting for Horizon about 20 minutes,but it doesn't show the result.Why?

绝大多数情况都是因为程序出bug了，请按`F12`查看开发者工具的输出并反馈给我。

Usually,there is a bug in the program,please press `F12` and report me with the console output

也有可能是因为站点版本过低导致无法搜索，请在github[下载](https://github.com/blurHY/Horizon)最新版Horizon并在零网目录里替换 (目录类似于`F:\ZeroNet\data\1CjMsvhJ2JsV4B5qo3FDHnF3mvRCcHuxBn`)

Maybe that's because your Horizon's version is too low.You should [download](https://github.com/blurHY/Horizon) from github and replace Horizon. The folder looks like `F:\ZeroNet\data\1CjMsvhJ2JsV4B5qo3FDHnF3mvRCcHuxBn`

topic.title: Please post Feature request / Bug report here - 在此反馈bug、请求功能
A lot of users are using old version and report the bug that has already been fixed
topic.body: So i'm going to add show-version feature to [TODO](https://github.com/blurHY/Horizon/projects/1#card-13084860).To let you know what version you are using esasily. (modified)

topic.title: Changelog Sep 22,2018
topic.body:
![test_img](optional/chrome_2018-09-22_20-59-27.gif)

- **Sort by peers count and word matches**
- **Zite Info**
- **Word cloud**
- Open a link in new window
- Merge sites with Zeroname data
- Search in your downloaded zites

1537182957_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUt.body:
> [balancer73](#comment_1_1PniNzyi8fygvwyBaLpA9oBDVWZ5fXuJUw): I load that site, I give all permissions, but when I write a query, like "ZeroNet", nothing happens.

Please press F12 then report me the logs

> [cyberweb](#comment_1_19rnQdzRSHq4YZ2PUfvnhn4mophYt2PGgj): Do you create a Horizon repo at the Gitcenter here at Zeronet?Git Center - http://127.0.0.1:43110/1GitLiXB6t5r8vuU2zC6a8GYj9ME6HMQ4t/

No,i haven't.Is it necessary?That will be a duplicate i think.I can set the .git folder of Horizon zite to optional not ignore.

> [balancer73](#comment_2_1PniNzyi8fygvwyBaLpA9oBDVWZ5fXuJUw): Immediately after opening the site, without any request: [...]

Please download from github and replace it
This is the bug that has already been fixed.

> [balancer73](#comment_3_1PniNzyi8fygvwyBaLpA9oBDVWZ5fXuJUw): We're talking about the site in ZeroNet? Why download from Git, is it not easier to update / fix the main site?

No.I am in China.And the zeronet is slow,so you can't receive the update very quickly.Maybe it needs 1 month to let every peers get the update
I could just publish to 1~3 peers currently.I'm a passive peer
It should be `2 hours ago` in ZeroHello on the item of Horizon.You could take a look at ZeroHello to know whether your Horizon is up to date

> [balancer73](#comment_4_1PniNzyi8fygvwyBaLpA9oBDVWZ5fXuJUw): You write on this forum message and I his immediately see. So your ZeroNet content is spreading fast. [...]

I don't know the reason.I used to write a zite that called demoone.The users said they can't receive the bug fix quickly,though   we are both in China

Status: 
- Tidying up data 
- Slow crawling (timout 200 secs)
Plan to make a specified version of zeronet that is just for crawling

1537186412_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUt.body:
> [caryoscelus](#comment_1_13oRBYqNeUr6Tvgt4KkAT9FT4XRiKFBjnE): Search doesn't work for me. On load, i get this [...]

I'm a passive peer.So you can't receive the update in a short time.Please download Horizon from github (https://github.com/blurHY/Horizon) then replace the Horizon zite folder

> [caryoscelus](#comment_2_13oRBYqNeUr6Tvgt4KkAT9FT4XRiKFBjnE): Even if you say so, i received that update soon enough ;) It still didn't work and i didn't had time to check version from gh, but now the version from new address does work.

I just published one version to the new address.So you could just receive the new version or don't receive anything

1537267498_12gAes6NzDS9E2q6Q1UXrpUdbPS6n.body: Kiwipedia's db schema is mush different to ZeroWiki then caused error and the function doesn't invoke the callback.So you think it's very slow,but it will never be done.

1537456736_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUt.body:
> [veksha](#comment_2_1JjpNsxGahfMwshM93RZwC4aP3qk6bY8GU): lol. please, implement results grouping. too many results from one page.

I've implemented that.It's grouped by zite.

> [veksha](#comment_3_1JjpNsxGahfMwshM93RZwC4aP3qk6bY8GU): good. which zite link is correct? i have two Horizon zites in my list.

I've lost the private key of the previous Horizon. So i need to make a new one

> [veksha](#comment_5_1JjpNsxGahfMwshM93RZwC4aP3qk6bY8GU): So you should update links, for example in the header of this page.

Ok
